      • fileExists

        public boolean fileExists(java.lang.String path)
                   throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        Returns true if file or directory at given path exists.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file or directory to check.
        Returns:
        True if file or directory at given path exists, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException - If exception occurs during checking file/directory existence.

      • deleteFilesInDirectory

        public void deleteFilesInDirectory(java.lang.String directory,
                                   java.lang.String extension)
                            throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        Deletes all files under the given parent directory and with given extension.
        Parameters:
        directory - Parent directory.
        extension - File extension.Null can be given to delete all files.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException - If exception occurs during deleting files.

      • createDirectories

        public java.lang.String createDirectories(java.lang.String parentPath,
                                          java.lang.String... directoryNames)
                                   throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        Creates directories.
        Parameters:
        parentPath - Path to parent directory.
        directoryNames - Names of directories from outer most to deepest.
        Returns:
        The path to deepest directory.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException - If exception occurs during process.
